author: wn.com
title: Greg Clark opens new Royal Opera House costume centre in the Thames Gateway (DCLG - ...
text: ( Source : DCLG - UK Department for Communities and Local Government ) Thousands of costumes played centre stage at the official opening of the new Royal Opera House costume centre by Communities Secretary Greg Clark today ( 15 October 2015 ).
